text: Yeh woh paigambar hain jinpar Allah ne inaam farmaya Adam ki aulad mein se, aur un logon ki nasal se jinhein humne Nooh ke saath kashti par sawaar kiya tha, aur Ibrahim ki nasal se aur Israel ki nasal se aur yeh un logon mein se thay jinko humne hidayat bakshi aur barguzida kiya.Inka haal yeh tha ke jab rehman ki aayat unko sunayi jati to rotey huey sajde mein gir jatey thay
